programme.desc: A basset hound is afraid of her owner's husband; a blue heeler mix with unique bedtime rituals.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar teams up with horse whisperer Pat Parelli to improve the behavior of the dogs and horses at a riding center; a schnauzer/poodle mix with separation anxiety and dog aggression.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Old and new cases that show the process for adopting a dog, introducing one to the home, setting rules and boundaries and dealing with the loss of a pet.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A pit bull is aggressive toward people and dogs; a dachshund mix exhibits aggression at feeding time and when it comes time to trim his nails.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar Millan investigates the case of a bulldog named Bella who has become aggressive ever since her owner's five-month rehab stint.

programme.desc: Cesar attempts to introduce Roscoe, an agoraphobic Akita who is too scared to leave the house and garden and has never been for a walk, to the outside world.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Weimaraner eats everything in sight; a yellow Lab's excess energy is expressed destructively; an Australian shepherd is unable to socialize with other dogs.

programme.desc: Three canines with issues at a dog-friendly ad agency office; a border collie mix becomes excited and unresponsive to commands when in her owner's truck.

programme.desc: A woman who has relinquished the role of pack leader to her Welsh Sealyham terrier; an English mastiff with too much energy; a Tibetan terrier who is a terror on walks.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Great Dane with an aggressive attitude; Cesar helps a shepherd mix recover from the issues developed while living in a hoarding situation so she can be rehomed.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.sub-title: How to Raise the Perfect Dog

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An aggressive lab-mastiff mix; a Jack Russell mix that barks obsessively; a woman is concerned at her dog's habit of barking and growling at people.

programme.desc: A Pekingese who refuses to eat or drink; a Chihuahua who bites people; two chow mixes who share a home but won't play nice with each other.
